title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Strategies for Enhancing Social Presence in Technology-Enhanced Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five core elements (technological affordances, multimedia functionality, social interaction, instructional design principles, learner characteristics) that constitute social presence in technology-based learning environments
Learners can design and apply at least three strategies to enhance social presence using mobile devices (smartphones)
Learners can evaluate the impact of social presence on learning outcomes in blended learning environments through case analysis

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
